name: WindmillAir
0:
”Alexa, turn on the AC”
”Alexa, turn off the AC”
”Alexa, set the AC to cool mode”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We want you to control your home comfort the way you want. Use the following voice commands for AC with Alexa:
- "Alexa, turn on/off [device name]"
- "Alexa, turn [device name] to [X] degrees"
- "Alexa, turn [device name] to [cool, eco, fan] mode"
- Alexa, turn [device name] to speed [low, medium, high, auto]"

Use the following voice command for Fan with Alexa:
- "Alexa, turn on/off [device name]"
- "Alexa set the [device name] speed to one/two/three/four/five"
- "Alexa set the [device name] speed to whisper/low/medium/high/boost"

This Alexa skill is compatible with the Windmill window air conditioner and the Windmill fan. Please use this skill with the app called "Windmill Air", available for Apple and Android.
For Android, download it here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.windmillair
And for iOS, download it here: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/windmill-air/id1589463108
